channel.title: [pi] 30 minute timer on login
channel.description:
if i make a long like for a timer like vain showed me will it work for each player? like
when a player logs in it yells there name if i put a timer on that will it stop it form yelling same persons name within that time limit if i put into playersave or will it stop everybody from doing it?

item.title: [pi] 30 minute timer on login

alright ill try it thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] 30 minute timer on login
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

im sorry its hard to explain

when someone logs in it yelss “playername has logged in”

im asking if i put a timer on it will it not yell that everytime they log in and out like to get full hp and prayer you can log out and back in and itll spam server

im also asking if the timer will work on just the player loging in and out but new players loging in it will still yell there name has log in

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] 30 minute timer on login
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Rephrase the question please.

I’m kinda getting it, but not so much, your asking when somebody logins it says “blahblah” blahblahuser" has logged in, you want a timer for that?

Read full topic
